title.en: A Prayer to the Successive Incarnations of the Karmapa

text.en: Protector, embodiment of the compassion of all Victors throughout the whole of space and time,
text.en-trans: chok dü gyalwé tukjé chikdü gön

text.en: Karmapa, emanation of Senggé, the sixth guide,
Knower of the three times, to all your successive incarnations I pray:
text.en-trans: dü sum künkhyen rimpar jön nam la

text.en: Inspire my mindstream with your blessings!
text.en-trans: solwa deb so dak gyü jingyi lob
